name: Format\TableColumnSelector
description: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a column.

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.description: A number that specifies a column index. The leftmost column of data has an index of . Only the column with the specific index is selected.

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description:
A number that specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All columns for this data descriptor are selected. See .
When dataOrientation is set to vertical, which is the default, each column displays data for one data descriptor. See .

properties.name: even
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the even columns.

properties.name: odd
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the odd columns.
